subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Bob and Mike Bryan routed Norbert Gombos and Lukas Lacko, 6-1, 6-2, 6-1, in doubles on Saturday to clinch a Davis Cup playoff for the United States over Slovakia in Hoffman Estates, Ill.
snippet: Bob and Mike Bryan routed Norbert Gombos and Lukas Lacko, 6-1, 6-2, 6-1, in doubles on Saturday to clinch a Davis Cup playoff for the United States over Slovakia in Hoffman Estates, Ill.
